apple_vendor_description: The kiss emoji featuring two men, with dark and light skin tones, on Apple devices radiates tenderness and romance, brought to life with Apple's advanced 3D rendering. Their faces are softly shaded, with subtle highlights suggesting closeness and affection, while the smooth gradients in their skin tones convey a naturalistic appearance. The gentle curve of their embrace and the soft rounding of their features underscore the loving sentiment, symbolizing romantic connection and intimacy.
